      • verifyHandshake

        public static boolean verifyHandshake(byte[] msg_to_peer,
                      byte[] peer_response)
        This method verifies that the peer id received in a handshake message matches with the peer id that was received in the tracker response that corresponds with the current peer's ip.
        Parameters:
        handshake - -> The handshakeMessage that the peer sent
        peer_id - -> The peer id that should be in the handshake method
        Returns:
        -> True if the peer id matches with the one in the message
